CONFIRM_DEACTIVATE.TITLE: Are You sure?
CONFIRM_DEACTIVATE.TEXT: By closing this window You will lose the entire project so far. Currently, it is not possible to save the project  .

TOOLTIPS.NEW_NAME: The name should have minimum 2 chars
TOOLTIPS.NEW_VERSION: The version have to minimum 3 chars including a dot and can be only digits and dots

TEXTS.ABOUT: The SwaggerGUI project is an openAPI and Swagger UI graphical extension. It allows anyone to literally click API resources. You don't have to tediously write hundreds of very similar lines - you can click everything easily and quickly, and thanks to copying already created resources, creating an interface becomes quick and easy.
TEXTS.COOKIE: This website uses cookies. By using this website, you accept the option of setting cookies in your browser.
